resources.string: Don\'t let the enemy tiles reach the bottom! Enemy tiles will randomly fall from the top of the grid. Luckily you have five types of tiles that will randomly generate as well! All player tile actions will activate on collision with an enemy tile. In addition to destroying the enemy tile it collides with, each player tile has a unique function. Just tap the tile you want to place from Player Tiles and tap where you want to put it on the board. Tiles can only be placed in the bottom 2 rows.
The Sword tile destroys any enemy tiles in the two squares above the collision.
The Great Sword tile destroys all enemy tiles above the collision.
The Dagger tile destroys each enemy tile that are diagonally above the placed position. It will also destroy an enemy tile on collision.
The Bishop tile destroys each enemy tile that are diagonally above the placed position. It will destroy one enemy tile above the diagonal tiles and it will also destroy an enemy tile on collision.
The Bomb tile destroys all adjacent enemy tiles around it.
